Find_Replace module¶

Module which contains functions to find and replace

Functions:

find_next(editor, evt)

Useful function to find the next occurence of a word on the EditWindow panel

replace(editor, evt)

Useful function to replace a the selected text by an other word on the EditWindow panel
Find_Replace.find_next(editor, evt)¶

Useful function to find the next occurence of a word on the EditWindow panel

Parameters

  • editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – EditWindow to apply the function

  • evt (wx.Event) – Evt which contains the string to find

Returns

True if the string is found, False if not

Return type

Boolean

Find_Replace.replace(editor, evt)¶

Useful function to replace a the selected text by an other word on the EditWindow panel

Parameters

  • editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – EditWindow to apply the function

  • evt (wx.Event) – Evt which contains the string to replace

Returns

True if something is replaced, False if not

Return type

Boolean
